verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Send|strong="H7971"\w* thou \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, that they may \w search|strong="H8446"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, which I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: of \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* shall ye \w send|strong="H7971"\w* a \w man|strong="H0259"\w*, every one a \w ruler|strong="H5387"\w* among them.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* by the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* them from the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Paran|strong="H6290"\w*: all those \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \add  \+w were|strong="H1992"\+w*\add* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And these \add were\add* their \w names|strong="H8034"\w*: of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, \w Shammua|strong="H8051"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zaccur|strong="H2139"\w*.
Of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, \w Shaphat|strong="H8202"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hori|strong="H2753"\w*.
Of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jephunneh|strong="H3312"\w*.
Of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, \w Igal|strong="H3008"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*.
Of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w Oshea|strong="H1954"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*.\f + \fr 13.8 \ft Oshea: also called, Joshua\f*
Of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w Palti|strong="H6406"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Raphu|strong="H7505"\w*.
Of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, \w Gaddiel|strong="H1427"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Sodi|strong="H5476"\w*.

Of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \add namely\add*, of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w Gaddi|strong="H1426"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Susi|strong="H5485"\w*.
Of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, \w Ammiel|strong="H5988"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gemalli|strong="H1582"\w*.
Of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*, \w Sethur|strong="H5639"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Michael|strong="H4317"\w*.
Of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, \w Nahbi|strong="H5147"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Vophsi|strong="H2058"\w*.
Of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, \w Geuel|strong="H1345"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Machi|strong="H4352"\w*.

These \add are\add* the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to spy \w out|strong="H8446"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*. And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Oshea|strong="H1954"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w* \w Jehoshua|strong="H3091"\w*.\f + \fr 13.16 \ft Oshea: also called Joshua\f*\f + \fr 13.16 \ft Jehoshua: or, Joshua\f*

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* them to spy \w out|strong="H8446"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Get you \w up|strong="H5927"\w* this \add way\add* \w southward|strong="H5045"\w*, and go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*:

And \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, what it \add is;\add* and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w dwelleth|strong="H3427"\w* therein, whether they \add be\add* \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* or \w weak|strong="H7504"\w*, \w few|strong="H4592"\w* or \w many|strong="H7227"\w*;

And what the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \add is\add* that they dwell \w in|strong="H3427"\w*, whether it \add be\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* or \w bad|strong="H7451"\w*; and what \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \add they be\add* that they \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H2007"\w*, whether in \w tents|strong="H4264"\w*, or in strong \w holds|strong="H4013"\w*;

And what the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \add is\add*, whether it \add be\add* \w fat|strong="H8082"\w* or \w lean|strong="H7330"\w*, whether there \w be|strong="H3426"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* therein, or not. And be ye of good \w courage|strong="H2388"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*. Now the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \add was\add* the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w firstripe|strong="H1061"\w* \w grapes|strong="H6025"\w*.

¶ So they went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w searched|strong="H8446"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* from the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Zin|strong="H6790"\w* unto \w Rehob|strong="H7340"\w*, as men \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*.

And they \w ascended|strong="H5927"\w* by the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*; where \w Ahiman|strong="H0289"\w*, \w Sheshai|strong="H8344"\w*, and \w Talmai|strong="H8526"\w*, the \w children|strong="H3211"\w* of \w Anak|strong="H6061"\w*, \add were\add*. (Now \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* was \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Zoan|strong="H6814"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.)

And they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Eshcol|strong="H0812"\w*, and cut \w down|strong="H3772"\w* from thence a \w branch|strong="H2156"\w* with \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w cluster|strong="H0811"\w* of \w grapes|strong="H6025"\w*, and they \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* it between \w two|strong="H8147"\w* upon a \w staff|strong="H4132"\w*; and \add they brought\add* of the \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w*, and of the \w figs|strong="H8384"\w*.\f + \fr 13.23 \ft brook: or, valley\f*

The \w place|strong="H4725"\w* was \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w Eshcol|strong="H0812"\w*, because \w of|strong="H0182"\w* the cluster of \w grapes|strong="H0811"\w* which the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* cut \w down|strong="H3772"\w* from thence.\f + \fr 13.24 \ft brook: or, valley\f*\f + \fr 13.24 \ft Eshcol: that is, A cluster of grapes\f*
And they \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* from \w searching|strong="H8446"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w after|strong="H7093"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

¶ And they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and to \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and to all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, unto the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Paran|strong="H6290"\w*, to \w Kadesh|strong="H6946"\w*; and brought \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* unto them, and unto all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, and \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* them the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And they \w told|strong="H5608"\w* him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* whither thou \w sentest|strong="H7971"\w* us, and surely it \w floweth|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*; and this \add is\add* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of it.

\w Nevertheless|strong="H0657"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add be\add* \w strong|strong="H5794"\w* that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \add are\add* \w walled|strong="H1219"\w*, \add and\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*: and moreover we \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w children|strong="H3211"\w* of \w Anak|strong="H6061"\w* there.

The \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*: and the \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, and the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*, and the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*: and the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* by the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and by the \w coast|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

And \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \w stilled|strong="H2013"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* before \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let us go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* at \w once|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it; for we are well \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w overcome|strong="H3201"\w* it.

But the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* with him \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We be not \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; for they \add are\add* \w stronger|strong="H2389"\w* than we.

And they brought \w up|strong="H3318"\w* an evil \w report|strong="H1681"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which they had \w searched|strong="H8446"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, through which we have \w gone|strong="H5674"\w* to \w search|strong="H8446"\w* it, \add is\add* a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that eateth \w up|strong="H0398"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof; and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that we \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* in \w it|strong="H8432"\w* \add are\add* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of a great \w stature|strong="H4060"\w*.\f + \fr 13.32 \ft men…: Heb. men of statures\f*

And there we \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w giants|strong="H5303"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Anak|strong="H6061"\w*, \add which come\add* of the \w giants|strong="H5303"\w*: and we were in our own \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* as \w grasshoppers|strong="H2284"\w*, and so we were in their \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.
